job_tasks.phrase: strives for the best customer-experience in online banking contact
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the focus on improving customer experience, which is a core business objective in online banking.

job_tasks.phrase: continuously achieve the objectives of the Rabobank
job_tasks.justification: This directly links the technical work to achieving organizational goals and business objectives.

job_tasks.phrase: continuously improving our voicebot to better serve our customers when they call us, using a combination of traditional Natural Language Processing and Generative AI-based features
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions improving a voicebot using both traditional NLP and Generative AI, indicating model development and enhancement.

job_tasks.phrase: working on an application landscape that supports over thirty thousand customer calls every day
job_tasks.justification: This implies developing and maintaining software systems that handle a large volume of customer interactions.
This refers to the engineering aspect of creating solutions, which aligns with software development.

job_tasks.phrase: participating in technical discussion where you may give your input or advice to the rest of the team
job_tasks.justification: This describes collaborative software development activities and contributing to technical decisions.
Microservices architecture is a fundamental concept in modern software development.

job_tasks.phrase: CI/ CD Pipelines (Azure DevOps, including biceps)
job_tasks.justification: CI/CD pipelines and Azure DevOps are key components of MLOps and software deployment processes.
Test automation and management are crucial for ensuring the quality and reliability of deployed systems, aligning with MLOps practices.
Ensuring code quality and managing architecture are operational responsibilities for maintaining production systems.
Sonar is a tool used for continuous inspection of code quality, which falls under operational aspects.

soft_skills.phrase: The end-user is always number one!
You're constantly eager to experiment with- and learn new techniques
Together with the team (DevOps, Product Owner, Business Analyst, UX designer, Scrum Master and architect) you'll devise practical solutions.
You'll have an active role in participating in technical discussion where you may give your input or advice to the rest of the team
You have fun in everything you do!

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the use of Generative AI features to improve a voicebot, aligning with the 'GenAI Engineer' profile. The role involves building and maintaining applications around these models, with a strong focus on customer-facing solutions and utilizing related frameworks and platforms.
